snippet.title: What Is F1® Manager 2022? | Game Overview & Early Gameplay
snippet.description:
Pre-Order F1® Manager 2022 digitally for a 10% discount and five days early access, to play from August 25*!  https://bit.ly/3M3WY95

First shown during the 2022 PC Gaming Show, Take a closer look at the world of F1® Manager 2022 with this special video, including new gameplay and details. Community Manager Steve James walks through the key features and areas you will control, as you become the Team Principal for one of the 10 official F1® teams.

Find out more:
Twitter – https://twitter.com/F1manager
Instagram - @F1manager
Facebook – https://facebook.com/f1managergame
Twitch - https://www.twitch.tv/f1manager 

#F1 #F1Manager

*Check out https://www.f1manager.com for full details on early access and 10% discount.
